docs.snippet: President Trump has begun a new push for legislation to crack down on illegal immigration and make it more difficult to obtain refuge in the United States, White House officials said Monday.

headline.print_headline: Trump Returns To a Hard Line On Immigrants
headline.main: Trump’s Immigration Tweets Followed by Policy Plans to Match

docs.snippet: The career counselor has the answers.

headline.print_headline: Want to Dive Into the Trump Job Pool? Ask Me Anything
headline.main: Want to Dive Into the Trump Job Pool? Ask Me Anything

docs.snippet: President Trump named John R. Bolton, a hard-line former American ambassador to the United Nations, to replace Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster.

headline.print_headline: Trump Chooses Hawk For 3rd Security Adviser As Shake-Up Continues
headline.main: Trump Chooses Bolton for 3rd Security Adviser as Shake-Up Continues

docs.snippet: The stock market continued to plunge Monday, as investors were unnerved by the unpredictable White House. Stocks are now down 4 percent this year.

headline.print_headline: Stocks Sink As a Bump Gives Way To a Bear
headline.main: Markets That Climbed the Trump Bump Are Tumbling Down From It

docs.snippet: While most remain with the president, some are having second thoughts, citing his pettiness, impulsiveness and profanity, even as they say he has delivered on issues.

headline.print_headline: White Evangelical Women, Core Trump Supporters, Are Tiptoeing Away
headline.main: White Evangelical Women, Core Supporters of Trump, Begin Tiptoeing Away

docs.snippet: In a rare act of bipartisanship and good sense, Congress refuses Mr. Trump’s most extreme proposals on foreign aid, the environment and a border wall.

headline.print_headline: Congress Resists Trump, for a Change
headline.main: Congress Resists the President, for a Change

docs.snippet: President Trump cited improved conditions in Liberia as evidence that the program, which allowed Liberians to live and work legally in the U.S., is no longer needed.

headline.print_headline: Temporary  Status Ends For Liberians In the U.S.
headline.main: Trump Ends Temporary Immigration Status for Thousands of Liberians

docs.snippet: Rex W. Tillerson, a former chief executive of Exxon Mobil, had been among President Trump’s most well-regarded cabinet choices. He is replaced by Mike Pompeo, currently the C.I.A. director.

headline.main: Trump Fires Rex Tillerson and Will Replace Him With C.I.A. Chief Pompeo

docs.snippet: A recent announcement about funding priorities for a major family planning program hints at retrograde thinking about contraception.

headline.main: The Trump Administration’s Backward Attitude Toward Birth Control

docs.snippet: The president dreams of living in a world with “Fox & Friends” and almost no one else.

headline.print_headline: One Thing Donald Trump Would Like Is Freedom From the Press
headline.main: One Thing Donald Trump Would Like Is Freedom From the Press
